body:
@DrinksandDame after that bait preview, I'm 100% sure that if there is going to be ntr, it will be on the industry side not in the school.

That female teacher will probably confront Kise/save Amuro. Honestly it is better than this than a fullblown ntr. It gave the story more flavor and a better story than the usual "fmc went to AV story". Hope it stays this way imo.
@DrinksandDame nice 1 i didn't even realise that was a guy lol and i thought kise was acting like a netorase cuck at the start so thanks for the summary.
@DrinksandDame as always thanks for the summary.
NTR next chapter finally confirmed lets go

Itaiamai Chapter 9 Summary here: https://pastebin.com/BsVNzAyF         lots of Kise pov in this chapter. Im sure it's not the most pleasant thing for many readers but hey, at least he's starting to get more relevant to the story.

Unless this is a flashback chapter this is proof the school poster [bj behind the curtain] chapter was bait and if that's bait it's probably safe to assume it's all been bait up until now at least. Kise was acting like a super simp being NTR'd by Suma but now he's making a move will we see blackmail? @jeonsann i think it's clear that she thought Suma was touching her, i'm more curious about whether Miss Hori saw him and if she tells Suma will that lead to a misunderstanding, ofc it's hard to tell exactly what's happening without context but hopefully DrinksandDame does another summary.
Oh God itaiamai 9 didn't seem to going well. Why r u letting him touch your ass
next is prob the ntr part
Again, this issue also don't have Akao
Chapter 9 I don't like it at all
